title: Freezing: Extra Story
original_name: フリージング EXTRA STORY
sinopse:
Short stories bundled with the first press release of the 2nd, 4th and 6th Blu-Ray/DVD volumes of the Freezing Vibration anime. Each stories is named and based off one of the manga in the series, with the original artist of that story drawing the new story.

1. Freezing: Pair Love Stories
2. Freezing Zero
3. Freezing
